unittitle_ssm: Anders Goldfarb photographs of Brooklyn neighborhoods
abstract_ssm: The collection contains 35 8x10" black and white photographs on fiber-based paper taken by Anders Goldfarb. The photographs document three Brooklyn neighborhoods: Borough Park (2009), Bushwick (2001), and Red Hook (2009). Goldfarb specializes in street photography and his photographs feature buildings, subway stations, elevated tracks, businesses, baseball fields, and the waterfront.
